name: Emotional Knife
description:
Finally, after 30+ days of consistent hard work I have published my FIRST game. All it requires to be worth, is your support and appreciation😇 about my Emotional Knife.

EMOTIONAL KNIFE is the intuitive creation of combination of ideas of fruit ninja and flappy bird. 

Being experienced Indie Game Developer of 1+ year (w.r.t present date) experience I have come up with the project.

I hope you will try it out. Donate what you want or Download it for free!!

Note: When installing it, Google Play protect might say: 

DONT BE AFRAID OF THIS. 

"GAME IS COMPLETELY SAFE"
